Class UserBanDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.persistence.GenericDAO<decoworld.model.UserBan,decoworld.model.UserBanPK>

  • public class UserBanDao
extends GenericDAO<decoworld.model.UserBan,decoworld.model.UserBanPK>
    A simple data access object for persisting user ban records.
